sentence: Representative Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) said that the decision would undoubtedly lead to more chaos and harm at the border: Democrats want to end Title 42 at the southern border.
title: Immigration Arrests and Deportations Plummet During Biden's First Year

sentence: YEAS: Rep. Bob Latta R-OH (5th), Rep. Marcy Kaptur D-OH (9th) NAYS: Rep. John Cornyn, R-Texas, to authorize the Homeland Security Department to partner with private nonprofit groups on cybersecurity training efforts.
